com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.data
Class OADataManager

java.lang.Object
  com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.data.OADataManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
OADataManagerAssets, OADataManagerLocal
public class OADataManager
extends java.lang.Object

A basic data manager class that manages scene data. In default, the working path is set to "OutdoorAR". 3D model files should placed in the "3Dmodels" sub-directory. Icon files should placed in the "icons" sub-directory.

Author:
Leigh Beattie, Gun Lee

getIcon

public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getIcon(java.lang.String id)
Returns a drawable of the icon for the map identified with given id in the icon directory at the working path. Looks for assets or local storage, depending on where the 3D models are read from.

Parameters:
id - string to identify the icon. (File name without extension.)
Returns:
Drawable of the icon

startLoading

public final void startLoading()
Called back when the library is ready for the data manager to load up (or add) the scenes. This method triggers the loadScenes() method, and makes sure it is not called multiple times. Subclasses should override loadScenes() method, and never override this method.

                                                         android.content.Context context)
